Ok, so i'm trying to make a space plane that flies, either with jet engines working normally, or a vtol type aircraft. With a regular jet engined aircraft, my plane nosedives forward into the ground and is either ripped to shreds or explodes on the spot. With my Vtol attempts, the aircraft pitches backwards, and either is ripped to shreds or explodes into a million tiny pieces.

What the heck is going on?

Well, when the plane pitches forward, You have too much weight at the front of your plane. Try moving the wings back a little more. For you VTOLs, try tilting your engines slightly forward in the space plane hanger. Hope this helps!
